original_text: And it came to pass in the mean while, that the heaven was black with clouds and wind, and there was a great rain. And Ahab rode, and went to Jezreel.
korean_text: 조금 후에 구름과 바람이 일어나서 하늘이 캄캄해지며 큰 비가 내리는지라 아합이 마차를 타고 이스르엘로 가니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in the mean while
that the heaven was black with clouds and wind
and there was a great rain
